sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app>
    <v-app-bar
        class="flex-grow-0"
        dark
        collapse-on-scroll
        fixed
    >
      <v-menu left bottom>
        <template v-slot:activator="{ on, attrs }">
          <v-btn icon v-bind="attrs" v-on="on">
            <v-app-bar-nav-icon> </v-app-bar-nav-icon>
          </v-btn>
        </template>

        <v-list>
          <v-list-item @click="goTo('/')">Home</v-list-item>
        </v-list>
      </v-menu>
      <v-app-bar-title>{{ $t("title") }}</v-app-bar-title>
      <v-spacer></v-spacer>

      <v-toolbar-items>Home</v-toolbar-items>

      <v-btn icon>
        <v-icon>mdi-magnify</v-icon>
      </v-btn>
      <v-btn icon>
        <v-icon>mdi-heart</v-icon>
      </v-btn>

    </v-app-bar>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'topToolbar',
  data:()=>{
  },
  methods: {
    goTo (path) {
      this.$router.replace(path)
    }
  }
}
</script>
